price: 9. То, boye basimbi sanduku ya ngolu ya Nkolo wayo wa bokasi mopesi manso.
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
